pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visualization of Multivariate Functions, Sets, and Data // We provide tools to (1) visualize multivariate density functions and density estimates with level set trees, (2) visualize level sets with shape trees, (3) visualize multivariate data with tail trees, (4) visualize scales of multivariate density estimates with mode graphs and branching maps, and (5) visualize anisotropic spread with 2D volume functions and 2D probability content functions. Level set trees visualize mode structure, shape trees visualize shapes of level sets of unimodal densities, and tail trees visualize connected data sets. The kernel estimator is implemented but the package may also be applied for visualizing other density estimates.
